content:
Subagent: Creating visualizations...

Step 1: Generating histogram
- Created distribution plot for 'sales_amount'
- Saved as: sales_distribution.png

Step 2: Creating time series plot
- Generated trend line for sales over time
- Saved as: sales_trend.png

Step 3: Building correlation heatmap
- Analyzed correlations between numeric columns
- Saved as: correlation_matrix.png

All visualizations complete. Returning to main agent.
